  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector, org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.servlet.WebSocketCreator

      • WebSocketHubConnector

        public WebSocketHubConnector(int port,
                             java.lang.String context)
        Create a web socket connector and add it to a web server running on a given port. If a web server isn't already created, this will start the web server.
